mapper.insert: insert into t_usertest_info (usertestpk,usertestid, usertestnick, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser) values (#{usertestpk},#{usertestid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertestnick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_usertest_info
and usertestnick = #{usertestnick}
